name: Office bearer of 1969 Civil Engg. Batch (DCE)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship is awarded to the students of B.Tech (Civil Engg.) on merit-cum-means basis.

name: Mrs. Inderjeet Kaur Office Secretary (WBO)
criteria_for_scholarship: Grant of Educational Scholarship Scheme (2016-17) “Distribution of Merit Scholarship 2016-17” under the Beti Bachao-Beti Padhao

name: Ms Madhu Jain
criteria_for_scholarship: Pramod Jain Merit Scholarship” is awarded to B.Tech (IT) student based on the academic performance of first four semesters.

name: Sh. Rajesh K Mahajan Sh. Mukesh Kumar Goel Sh. Sanjeev Kumar Sh. Vinit Kumar
criteria_for_scholarship: MRSV Award to promote “innovations”. Award comprises of Rs.50,000/- cash reward for a period of 5 years to B.Tech Elect. Engg. Stream students.

name: Sh. Durga D. Agrawal
criteria_for_scholarship: Grant for charitable, religious, scientific, literary or educational purposes and to support scholarship for the students on the basis of merit-cum- means to any student of university.

name: Late Shri Hari Chand Batra (Alumni of erstwhile DCE) & Mrs. Shashi Batra
criteria_for_scholarship: Hari and Shashi Batra Scholarship” is awarded to non-resident (Non Hosteller) female student (s) Hari and Shashi Batra Scholarship” is awarded to non-resident (Non Hosteller) female student (s) of B.Tech Elect. Engg. whose family income is less than Rs. 5 lacs per annum. Further, Scholarship is awarded on the basis of highest (CGPA) for first four semesters.

name: Late Sh. J.L.Pahwa Ex DCE Professor of Civil Engg. Deptt. & Mrs.Ashok Pahwa, W/o Late Sh. J.L. Pahwa
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship is awarded on the basis of highest (CGPA) upto 4th semester for 3rd year students of Civil Engg. Deptt

name: Goswami Brothers Alumni Gold Medal
criteria_for_scholarship: Medal/award is awarded to 2nd & 3rd year student of Polymer Science & Chemical Technology based on academic result as on Feb, 2018

name: Office Bearer of Class of 1959 Scholarship (DP Alumni)
criteria_for_scholarship: Class of 1959 Scholarship Scholarship amount to Rs. 50,000/- per year shall be awarded to two students each of 2nd & 3rd year on the basis of Merit, Need, Social responsibility & Leadership in Science & Technology

name: Neena Nangia Memorial Award
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship is awarded to 2nd year students of Elect. Engg. Deptt. on the basis of merit-cum-means (1st & IInd Sem result) as on Dec, 2018

name: Gp.Capt. Raghbir Singh Bhola (Retd.)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship of Rs. 15,000/- annually for 20 years is awarded to a Sports person or someone wanting to do Electrical Engineering and has limited financial means in the name of “Gp. Capt. R.S. Bhola, DTU alumni and Ex-Olympian”

name: Sh. Suraaj Bhatia
criteria_for_scholarship: Suraj & Prem Bhatia Scholarship Scholarship amount of Rs. 60,000/- per annum each shall be awarded to 02 female students. (B.Tech Mechanical Engineering)

name: Sh. Santosh Kumar Garg
criteria_for_scholarship: A medal and a cash award of Rs. 40,000 shall be given to the Girl Topper from 3rd year batch of any. Engg. Branch for 10 years

name: Late Dr. D. Roy Choudhury Memorial Award (Ex DCE Professor of Computer Engg. Deptt.)
criteria_for_scholarship: Medal plus Cash Award (total amounting to Rs. 50,000/- annually for 10 years) shall be given to overall topper of 2nd year student of Computer Science Engg. Deptt.

name: Goswami Brothers Scholarship Shri. Lokesh C. Goswami, Dr. Bhuvenesh C. Goswami, Dr. D. Yogi Goswami, Shri Tushar K. Goswami)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amount of Rs. 50,000/- per year shall be awarded to the students either of 2nd or 3rd year on the basis of merit preferably to a ward of Sanskrit School teacher or a school teach or a real needy candidate

name: Sh. Manmohan Singh Passi
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amounting to INR 60,000/- per annum each shall be awarded to TWO students (One male and one female) from economically challenged backgrounds of 3rd year in any engineering or computer science discipline based on their academic performance from I to IV semester (At least one of them must be from core Engineering branch).

name: Dr. Hari Johri
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amount of Rs. 60,000/- per annum each shall be awarded to 02 female students (one UG & one PG, from economically challenged background) of Computer Engg. or Environmental Engg. based on their academic performance upto previous year

name: Sh. Dheeraj Soni
criteria_for_scholarship: Leela Wati & Mangat Ram Soni Scholarship Scholarship amounting to INR 1,00,000/- shall be awarded to one student from B.Tech 3rd semester with economically challenged background. All students below the family income of 5 lakh per annum are eligible. In case the applicant pool is larger than one, the student should be chosen on the basis of merit (CGPA upto 2nd semester) with a pre condition that the student has passed in all subjects in 1st and 2nd semesters

name: Sh. C.P. Nehra (US Permanent Resident)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship of Rs.60,000/- shall be awarded to one student each of Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering and Electrical Engineering on merit cum means basis. CGPA upto previous year will be considered.

name: Mrs. Gopina Goyal C/o Dr. Alok Goyal
criteria_for_scholarship: This Gold Medal will be awarded to the student who achieves the highest overall GPA across all streams in the flagship undergraduate B.Tech program at the time of graduation.

name: Mr. Rishabh Chandra Mangal (Alumni 1971, B.E Electrical)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amounting to Rs. 60,000/- per year shall be awarded to the PwD student of 2nd year of B.Tech any branch having highest marks in total I and II semester

name: Mr. & Mrs. Laxmi and Raj Mrig
criteria_for_scholarship: Two scholarship amounting to Rs. 60,000/- per annum each shall be awarded to two female students pursuing engineering degrees preferably in electric power systems/Electrical Engineering.

name: Mr. Arun Gupta and his friends, alumni of 2005 batch of Mechanical Engineering,DCE
criteria_for_scholarship: B.Tech 3rd year Scholarship of Rs. 60,000/- per annum shall be awarded to the Tech topper girl from 3rd year, across all streams for B.Tech program from university, on merit cum means basis, having CGPA more than 8 upto 4th sem and family income below Rs. 5,00,000/-. The scholarship is for girls only.

name: Sh. Jagjit Singh Ahuja (Alumni of batch 1971, Civil Engineering)
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amounting to Rs. 60,000/- per annum shall be awarded to a student of B.Tech. Civil Engineering based on his/her academic performance from Ist to IInd semester and with the family income below 5 Lacs.

name: Sh. Vijay Birbal
criteria_for_scholarship: “Vijay Birbal Gold Medal” for excellence in Engineering. Every year a Medal and a cash of Rs. 40,000/- shall be awarded to one final year student of Mechanical Engineering based on his/her academic performance from Ist to VIth semester (purely on merit basis). The award is for 10 years only and not for the life time.

name: Sh. C.S. Arora
criteria_for_scholarship: Scholarship amounting to Rs. 60,000/- per annum shall be awarded to a girl student of 1st year B.Tech (Mechanical Engineering) whose parents annual income is minimum out of all the applicants. If more than one girl is eligible on income criterion, then the girl with highest JEE score may be awarded the scholarship.

name: Sh. Prem Kumar Asija
criteria_for_scholarship:
Scholarship amount of Rs. 3 Lacs, Rs. 60,000/- per annum shall be awarded on merit cum means basis to one student of Electronics & Communication Engineering based on his/her academic performance from Ist to VIth semester for a period of five years. Only students with CGPA 8.0 or above.

The balance amount of Rs. 3 Lacs will be kept in a FD. This is expected to help increase the scholarship amount to Rs. 85,000/- per annum for the next five years. The selection criteria will be same as for the first five years
